alert.note: Alert for Southern High Plains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 3:24AM MST until January 12 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST SUNDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 60 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow ending with areas of blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. * WHERE...Southern High Plains. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until 5 PM MST Sunday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
